overview: “David is the Vice President of Products. Prior to joining Mozes, David built the wireless services product marketing team for Palm, Inc. where he transitioned Palm’s legacy PC sync to modern Web-based wireless services. In his posts at Palm and previously Handspring, Inc., he drove global product strategy, user experience design, business planning and launch activities for wireless applications. Working with wireless operators worldwide, David’s team ensured Palm’s offerings fit well into wireless operator portfolios. Prior to Handspring, David held various marketing and product management roles with Xenote, Inc., a consumer device and Web startup, PointCast, Inc., an ad-based online consumer news application, and Apple. David began his career as a submarine officer in the U.S. Navy. He holds an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business and a BS in Aerospace Engineering from Boston University.” (Source: Mozes)
